auth.loginDescription: Sign in to sync notes with Google Drive

agreeToTerms.prefix: By signing in, you agree to our

auth.drivePermissionDenied: Google Drive access was not granted. Please sign in again and allow Drive access to sync your notes.

settings.logoutWarningNormal: Your data is synced. You can sign in again anytime to access your notes.
settings.logoutWarningUnsynced: You have unsynced changes. They will be uploaded when you sign in again on this device.
settings.logoutWarningOffline: You're offline with unsynced changes. These changes may be lost if you sign out now.
settings.logoutWarningSyncing: Please wait for sync to complete before signing out.
settings.waitForSync: Please wait for sync to complete
settings.displayModeDescription: Choose how to open the extension
settings.fullscreenDesc: Open in a new browser tab
settings.displayModeHint: Changes will apply the next time you open the extension

notes.title: Title
notes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.getStarted: Start your first note by clicking the + button in the top corner

ai.title: AI
ai.chatDescription: Ask me anything about this note. I'll answer based on the note's context.

share.title: Share note
share.publicDescription: Create a public link, anyone with the link can view.
share.realtimeDescription: Start a live collaboration session. Others can join using the room code.
share.realtimeNote: You must start the session first before sharing the code. Others who join will sync with your note content.
share.shareCodeToInvite: Share this code to invite others:
share.emailDescription: Share directly with another G-Note user:
share.roomNotFound: Room not found. Please check the code and try again.
share.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
share.fileTooLarge: Note is too large to share (max 1MB). Try removing images.
share.userNotFound: User not found. They need a G-Note account to receive shared notes.
share.emailSent: Note shared! An email notification has been sent.

install.title: Install G-Note
install.description: Add to home screen for quick access
install.alreadyInstalledDescription: You're using the app version of G-Note.
install.androidChromeInstructions: Tap the menu icon (⋮) at the top, then select "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"
install.desktopChromeInstructions: Click the install icon (⬇) in the address bar, or go to Menu → Install app
install.iosSafariInstructions: Tap the Share button below, then "Add to Home Screen"
install.iosChromeInstructions: For the best experience, open in Safari and tap Share → Add to Home Screen
install.androidOtherInstructions: Tap the menu then "Add to Home screen" or "Install"
install.desktopFirefoxInstructions: Firefox doesn't support PWA installation. Try Chrome or Edge for the best experience.
install.desktopSafariInstructions: Click File → Add to Dock, or use Chrome/Edge for full PWA support.
install.chromeExtensionDescription: Install the Chrome extension for quick access from your browser toolbar.
install.chromeExtensionInfo: The extension works with Chrome, Edge, Brave, and other Chromium-based browsers.

stylePicker.uploadImage: Drag & drop or click to upload

noteActions.exportDescription: Download as PDF, Word, or other formats
noteActions.importDescription: Load from PDF, Word, image, or text file
noteActions.ocrWarning: Image files use OCR to extract text. Results may not be 100% accurate.

speech.notSupportedMessage: Your browser doesn't support voice input. Please try using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge for the best experience.
speech.notSupportedTip: Tip: Make sure you're using the latest version of your browser.
speech.permissionMessage: Allow microphone access to use voice-to-text.

trash.title: Trash
trash.emptyTrashConfirm: This will permanently delete {{count}} note(s). This action cannot be undone.
trash.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete {{count}} note(s). This action cannot be undone.
trash.deleteOneConfirm: This note will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

freeNote.localStorageWarning: Your note is saved in this browser only. It may be lost if you clear browser data. Click 'Save Permanently' to keep it forever with a free account.
freeNote.featureLockedDescription: "{{feature}}" requires a free account. Sign up to unlock all features and save your notes permanently.
freeNote.resetDescription: This will clear all content and cannot be undone.

offline.nowOffline: You're offline. Changes will sync when back online.
offline.offlineBanner: You're offline. Your notes are saved locally.
offline.networkRequiredDescription: This action requires an internet connection. Please check your connection and try again.
offline.changesWillSync: Changes will sync automatically when online

errorBoundary.editorErrorDescription: Something went wrong with the editor. Your changes may not be saved.
errorBoundary.listErrorDescription: Something went wrong while loading your notes. Please try again.
errorBoundary.drawingErrorDescription: Something went wrong with the drawing tool. Please try again.
errorBoundary.modalErrorDescription: Something went wrong while opening this note. Please try again.
errorBoundary.genericErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errorBoundary.appErrorDescription: Something went wrong and the app needs to reload. We apologize for the inconvenience.
